bsicons 0.1.0.9000

bsicons

An R package for using Bootstrap icons in Shiny and R Markdown

Installation

Install the stable release of bsicons on CRAN:

install.packages("bsicons")

Example 

bsicons::bs_icon("geo", size = "3rem")
